author: Rohan Dutta
comment: This watch face looks great on my urbane. The fact that this face is free makes it even better.                                    Edit: the ambient mode is difficult to read and with no option to disable it I'm changing my rating from 5 to 4 stars.

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content:
Hi Rohan
Thanks for your feedback and sorry for the 5-star review! We will keep working on this job and make better watch faces!

title: Would pay for

author: Brandon Reznik
comment: Ambient mode looks awesome but when the watch face is active it is way too cluttered. Would give 5 stars if there was a way to customize it especially since the temperature is always off by at least 20 degrees. Would also like to remove the numbers or at least make them smaller.
title: Ok

author: Robert Lewis
comment: I love this watch face! But do agree with others that the temperature indicator is incorrect. It should just be removed. I have a Nexus 6P, Android 7, and a Moto 360 1st Gen. I highly recommend it.
title: Beautiful!

author: Eric Kaiser
comment: But if the weather is wrong, it may as well not be there. App hasn't been updated on some time, so probably abandoned.
title: Exactly the look I wanted

author: Norris Sydnor
comment: Nice watchface on my Moto 360. I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 because the weather does not report correctly on my Moto 360. Like someone else mentioned, the weather is off by about 20 degrees Farenheit.

author: Steve Palmero
comment: This is a solid, basic watch face that displays all the information I would quickly want to access, however the weather display is either inaccurate or just plain incorrect, and the ambient/always-on mode is a bit TOO minimal for my tastes.
title: Mostly pretty good.

author: Scott Featherston
comment: ... But the ambient mode is a little TOO stripped down, and it really is a shame :(
title: One of the most beautiful watch faces you can get...

author: Thomas Lambrecht
comment: It looks beautiful. 1 problem though, the temperature doesn't show; does anyone know the solution for this?
title: Awesome

author: Joydeep Datta Gupta
comment: What is the black counter at 3 o clock position. Show nothing do nothing. Useless blank counter. Moto 360.
title: Looks good but

author: Rob Lawson
comment: Great face, with new phone and Android watch the two had to be connected because I was prompted on the watch to install this watch face.  Which is different than the way it used to work.  Thank you for such a great watch face!

author: Manny Nova
comment: Beautiful watch face but the weather in wrong.
title: Almost Perfect

author: Lim TL
comment: Temperatures meter not working. Otherwise it's nice watch face.
title: Nice face

author: Bogdan Ghitescu
comment: Temperature is incorrect. Please fix.
title: Temp incorrect.

author: Kawo Lee
comment: very nice. Is it possible to change the temperature to Step? it will be perfect

author: Li Raz
comment: Can I get it on A9 watch?

author: Ian Metcalfe
comment: And free!
title: Elegant

author: Davoud Azimi
comment: harika

author: Sanzhar Idrissov
comment: Beautiful

author: windsor Dou
comment: I can't believe this watch face is free. It's elegant
title: Wonderful

comment: Love it, but the weather does not seem to update...

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content:
Hi Josh
Does it work now?

author: RigoMortis
comment: Great looking watch but I mainly use ambient mode for any watch face. This ambient mode only has the arms, nothing else.
title: Ambient mode stinks

author: thor paulsen
comment: Poor performance

author: Mark Deamer
comment: Thank you.

reply.author: MobiDev Studio
reply.content:
Hi Mark
Thanks for your feedback and 5-star review! We will keep working on this job and make more better watch faces.Thanks!

title: Fantastic face.
